References.title: CBASS is a cGAS-STING adaptor that activates innate immunity against viral infections
STING is a transducer of cyclic dinucleotide signals for DNA and other stimuli
cGAS is an adaptor protein that activates the STING-dependent innate immune response to cyclic dinucleotides
The cGAS-STING pathway is a key component of innate immunity against viral infections
CBASS is a novel adaptor protein that activates the STING-dependent innate immune response to viral infections
The cGAS-STING pathway is required for the innate immune response to viral infections in mice
cGLR is a novel adaptor protein that activates the STING-dependent innate immune response to viral infections
The STING pathway is a key component of innate immunity against viral infections
CBASS is a novel adaptor protein that activates the STING-dependent innate immune response to viral infections in mice
The cGAS-STING pathway is required for the innate immune response to viral infections in human cells
cGLR is a novel adaptor protein that activates the STING-dependent innate immune response to viral infections in human cells
